long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

Loop is a relationship assistant that helps you unlock the power of your network. Loop collects and manages information on the people in your life - enabling you to activate, cultivate, and purposefully expand your professional network.  


​​Loop uses AI to help you: 

Organize your professional relationships based on enriched data.
Easily recap a professional interaction, just by talking to the Assistant.
Deepen your professional network based on your goals.
Easily track who you should follow-up with within your network.
Determine who you should reach out to in your network, based on data-driven recommendations and your professional goals. 


How to install 

- Click “Add to Chrome” from this page.
- Click “Add Extension” when prompted by Chrome. 
- How to sign up
- Log into LinkedIn from your Chrome browser.
- While on LinkedIn, click the Extensions puzzle icon on the upper right corner of Chrome.
- Click on Loop from the dropdown, which will launch the extension.
- Sign up with your Google account.
- Connect your LinkedIn account by clicking “Connect”. You can also skip this step and do it later by visiting your Profile within the extension. 
- Congratulations, you’re all set up with the Loop extension! To get the most out of Loop, download the Loop app. Contact [email] to get on our waiting list.
